message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price! I think you'll love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me in the middle?
I can see you're interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $90. How about we compromise at $95?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $92?
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $92. How about we try $96?
I'm getting close, but I still think I can get a better deal. How about we try $94?
I can see you're really pushing for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go below $99. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it!
